attributes.action: Block Donald J Trump from entry into the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Block Donald J Trump from entry into the UK.

The signatories believe Donald J Trump should be banned from UK entry.

The UK has banned entry to many individuals for hate speech. The same principles should apply to everyone who wishes to enter the UK. 

If the United Kingdom is to continue applying the 'unacceptable behaviour' criteria to those who wish to enter its borders, it must be fairly applied to the rich as well as poor, and the weak as well as powerful.
attributes.background: The UK has banned entry to many individuals for hate speech. The same principles should apply to everyone who wishes to enter the UK.
